Package ides.api.plugin.io

Interface FileIOPlugin

  • public interface FileIOPlugin
    Interface for plugins which save/load DESModels or which save/load meta-data sections in DESModel files.

    For meta-data sections, refer to external documentation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getIOTypeDescriptor()
      Return the string describing the type of model handled by the plugin.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getMetaTags()
      Returns the set of meta-data "tags" handled by the plugin.
      java.lang.String getSaveDataVersion()
      Returns the version of the format in which the model data is saved.
      java.lang.String getSaveMetaVersion​(java.lang.String tag)
      Returns the version of the format in which the meta-data section with the given "tag" is saved.
      DESModel loadData​(java.lang.String version, java.io.InputStream stream, java.lang.String fileName)
      Load a DES model from the provided stream.

      Save the meta-data section with the given "tag" for a given DES model.

    • Method Detail

      • getIOTypeDescriptor

        java.lang.String getIOTypeDescriptor()
        Return the string describing the type of model handled by the plugin. This string is matched against the type in IDES model files.

        For example, the type of Finite-State Machines is "FSA".

        This method is relevant only to data-handling plugins. Meta-data plugins do not need to implement this method.

        Returns:
        the string describing the type of model handled by the plugin

      • getSaveDataVersion

        java.lang.String getSaveDataVersion()
        Returns the version of the format in which the model data is saved.

        This method is relevant only to plugins which save model data.

        Returns:
        the version of the format in which the model data is saved

      • getMetaTags

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getMetaTags()
        Returns the set of meta-data "tags" handled by the plugin. These tags are matched against the meta-data tags in IDES model files.

        For example, the tag for layout meta-data in FSA files is "layout".

        Returns:
        the set of meta-data "tags" handled by the plugin

      • getSaveMetaVersion

        java.lang.String getSaveMetaVersion​(java.lang.String tag)
        Returns the version of the format in which the meta-data section with the given "tag" is saved.

        This method is relevant only to plugins which save model meta-data.

        Parameters:
        tag - the "tag" for which version information is requested
        Returns:
        the version of the format in which the meta-data section with the given "tag" is saved; if the "tag" is not supported by this plugin, the return value is unspecified

      • saveData

        void saveData​(java.io.PrintStream stream,
              DESModel model,
              java.lang.String fileName)
       throws FileSaveException
        Save the description of the DES model into the provided stream. It is highly recommended that the data conforms to the XML format.

        The provided file name can be used if the plugin needs to work with additional files in the directory or needs the name of the save file. The file name is only for information purposes. All data must be written to the provided stream.

        Parameters:
        stream - stream where to write the data (will be encoded into UTF-8)
        model - DES model to save
        fileName - absolute path to the file where the model will be saved
        Throws:
        FileSaveException - when there is a problem saving the data

      • loadData

        DESModel loadData​(java.lang.String version,
                  java.io.InputStream stream,
                  java.lang.String fileName)
           throws FileLoadException
        Load a DES model from the provided stream.

        The provided file name can be used if the plugin needs to work with additional files in the directory or needs the name of the loaded file. The file name is only for information purposes. All data must be read from the provided stream.

        Parameters:
        version - the version of the format of the model data
        stream - UTF-8 encoded stream with the model data
        fileName - absolute path to the file from where the model is loaded
        Returns:
        the loaded model
        Throws:
        FileLoadException - when there is a problem loading the model

      • loadMeta

        void loadMeta​(java.lang.String version,
              java.io.InputStream stream,
              DESModel model,
              java.lang.String tag)
       throws FileLoadException
        Loads meta-data for a given DES model from a meta-data section.
        Parameters:
        version - the version of the format of the meta-data section
        stream - UTF-8 encoded stream from where meta-data should be read
        model - the DES model for which the meta-data is to be loaded
        tag - the "tag" of the meta-data section to be loaded
        Throws:
        FileLoadException - when there is a problem loading the meta-data

      • saveMeta

        void saveMeta​(java.io.PrintStream stream,
              DESModel model,
              java.lang.String tag)
       throws FileSaveException
        Save the meta-data section with the given "tag" for a given DES model. It is highly recommended that the data conforms to the XML format.
        Parameters:
        stream - stream where to write the meta-data (will be encoded into UTF-8)
        model - the DES model for which the meta-data is to be saved
        tag - the "tag" of the meta-data section to be saved
        Throws:
        FileSaveException - when there is a problem saving the mata-data
